EmailTemplate.name: Examination update
EmailTemplate.subject: Examination update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for your email.
Your examination is progressing well. Regretfully we are unable to update you on the status of your examination results, or receipt of any specific examiner reports to date due to examination rules. Please be reassured that Graduate
Education maintains contact with your examiners and reminders are issued on a regular basis. Once all reports have been proceed you will be notified as soon as possible.
In extreme cases when the examination report(s) are significantly overdue, Graduate Education will contact your main supervisor to discuss.
If you have registered to Graduate and are concerned you may not make the deadline, you can defer to the next
Graduation ceremony. For detailed information, please contact Graduations office.
Best wishes
Thank you _______________________
​ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia T: +61 3 990 53009 W: www.monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: www.monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
We're listening….your feedback helps us improve Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MonashGraduateEducation
